# tf.sysconfig.get_lib

``` python
get_lib()
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/platform/sysconfig.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.5/tensorflow/python/platform/sysconfig.py).

Get the directory containing the TensorFlow framework library.

#### Returns:

The directory as string.
